item.title: Migrating Email to Microsoft 365
item.description: Study Guide - Migrating Email to Microsoft 365 When I was studying to complete my MCSA: Office 365 in 2018, I struggled a bit keeping the multiple migration options straight. I needed to work through the material again anyway, maybe my notes will help others that are studying. I worked through the Exchange Online Docs and made a few notes. Migration Types Most of the study material for MS-100 talks about four primary migration methods: Staged, Cutover, Hybrid and IMAP.
